notes.title: Authors contributions
notes.p: S.X., M.C., D.P.: Conceived, designed, and implemented the study; M.C., S.X., W.J.: Statistics analysis; S.X., D.P., Y.L. and W.C.: Reagents/materials/analysis tools; X.S., M.C., X.M.: Drafted the manuscript; All authors edited the manuscript and approved the final version.
